Headline: Red Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change at Howard
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are departing on the Purple Line side at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are departing on the Purple Line side at Howard.  

Bus shuttle service is available from Howard to Bryn Mawr to provide connecting service.  At this time also consider alternative service to better serve your trip such as, #151 Sheridan, #22 Clark, #147 Outer or #36 Broadway.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Southwest Hwy and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Southwest Hwy and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

Allow extra travel time.
